1:
Yahweh, the man you made king is glad because you have caused him to be strong.\q2 He rejoices because you have enabled him to defeat his enemies.
\q1
2:
You have given him everything he most desired,\q2 and you have not refused to do what he requested you to do.



\q1
3:
You have done so many wonderful things for him.\q2 You placed a gold crown on his head.
\q1
4:
He asked you to let him live for a long time,\q2 and you have enabled him to live for a long time.


\q1
5: His power as king is very great because you have allowed him to win victories over his enemies.\q1
6:
You will bless him forever,\q2 and you have caused him to be joyful in your presence.


\q1
7:
Yahweh, you are God Almighty,\q2 and the king trusts in you.
\q1 Because you faithfully love him,
\q2 disastrous things will never happen to him.
\q1
8:
You will enable him to kill all his enemies,\q2 all those who hate him.


\q1
10:
You will remove their children from this earth;\q2 their descendants will all disappear.


\q1
11:
They wanted to harm you,\q2 but what they plan will never succeed.
\q1
12:
You will cause them to run away\q2 by shooting arrows at them.



\q1
13: Yahweh, show us that you are very strong!\q2 When you do that, we will sing and praise you because you are very powerful.
